Title: Pee Mak
Writer: Chantavit Dhanasevi, Nontra Kumwong, Banjong Pisanthanakun
Actors: Mario Maurer, Davika Hoorne, Nattapong Chartpong, Pongsatorn Jongwilak
Plot: Mak served in the war during the beginning of the Rattanakosin Dynasty. At war he became friends with Ter, Puak, Shin, and Aey, whose lives he saved. Once the war was over, Mak invited his ...
